description: This file contains integration tests for the Sambanova model using pytest, testing various functionalities such as basic response, streaming, async operations, memory, response modeling, JSON mode, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model for movie scripts with title, genre, and plot fields.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to assert that the metrics in the response are valid and sum correctly.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic synchronous run of the Agent with a simple prompt.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response from the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous run of the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous streaming response from the Agent.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the Agent's memory feature by maintaining context across multiple interactions.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests the Agent's ability to return structured responses using a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests the Agent's JSON mode response with a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history feature with SQLite storage, verifying message count and sequence.
